name: StoryBuilder
description: A graph-based story creation platform built with Laravel, Inertia and React Flow in TypeScript. Enables users to visualise narrative structure, link story nodes, and iterate collaboratively.

name: Personal Portfolio
description: A custom-built personal portfolio built with Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, and ShadCN. Features animated parallax layers, custom illustrations, environmental motion effects, a curated blog engine, and a UI theme centred around minimalism and soft, earthy aesthetics.

name: Alive Game Engine (Work-in-Progress)
description: Custom C++ game engine exploring real-time rendering, event-driven architecture, and design patterns like Observer and Factory. Built with OpenGL, GLFW, and FMOD. Status: Prototype phase. Currently paused after core systems implementation.

name: pdf-lib-extended
description: A JavaScript library that extends the popular pdfâ€‘lib library by adding helper methods for drawing shapes, wrapping text, tables and simplified PDF manipulation workflows.
